basicInfo.name: Tea Post
basicInfo.cuisine_string: Tea, Fast Food, Street Food, Beverages, Sandwich, Coffee

establishment.address: PL 10, Khadki Street, White Orchid, Adajan Gam, Surat
establishment.res_chain_text: See all 12 Tea Post outlets in Surat

items.name: Kadak Kold Koffee
items.description: Quench your summer thirst with our Kadak Kold Koffee! Bold, refreshing, and a must-have for strong coffee lovers

items.name: Lemon Ice Tea
items.description: A super-refreshing cup of Lemon Ice Tea that is created with authentic Assamese tea leaves and fresh lemons. It is perfect for hydrating the body and getting charged up instantly.

items.name: Hot Coffee (2 Cups)
items.description: The classic cup of hot coffee created with creamy milk and authentic Columbian coffee. It is one of the most popular refreshments that is served hot to revitalize your senses.

items.name: Classic Cold Coffee*
items.description: A treat for those who like their cup of coffee served chilled! The same authentic cup of coffee blended with milk, sugar, and a balanced proportion of ice cubes ? making it refreshing for the soul.

items.name: Mojito Cooler
items.description: The blend of simple ingredients, mint, sugar, lime juice  is the perfect balance of sweet and tart. Our Mojito is the easiest way to refresh yourself to beat the mid-day blues.

items.name: Milk Shake Mango
items.description: Summer is incomplete without mangoes. A cup of cold milk with all-time favourite mango and sugar to refresh and energise you. Blended with ice cubes, this drink is delectable.

items.name: Hazelnut Cold Coffee*
items.description: "Feel the hazelnut dazzle" lip-smacking Hazelnut Cold Coffee leaving a sweet and nutty flavour of hazelnut tingling on your tongue. With creamy milk and ice cube, it's the perfect refreshment."

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Hot and crunchy potato sticks deep fried to perfection to give it the signature golden hues. These delicious French fries are showered with tangy chat masala to tease your taste buds.

items.name: Sabudana Vada (4 Pcs)
items.description: Boiled Sabudana are mixed with Farali flour and selected masalas which are suitable for fasts. And fasting day or not, freshly fried Sabudana Vada are hot and happening on any given day.

items.name: Chai Thepla Combo
items.description: The ultimate gujju snack (3 pcs) Thepla to be relished with your favorite from our array of flavoured chai. This mouthwatering treat is A MUST TRY.

items.name: Break Bread Combo
items.description: Indulge in the goodness of a grilled-to-perfection butter & cheese sandwich, paired with your choice of amazing Tea Post Wali Chai!

items.name: Chai Maska Bun Combo
items.description: Try our delicious Maska Bun - laced with Dollops of Butter with your choice of tea - to make one of the most amazing Desi tea time combos!

items.name: Mexicano Combo
items.description: A true fiesta of fiery flavours! A lip-smacking combo of Mexican Cheese Grilled Sandwich and Mexican Puff - destined to leave you craving for more.

items.name: Best Trinity Combo
items.description: Unleash the power of the trinity - with your favourite Chai, your favorite Maska Bun, and 2 pcs of delicious Samosa. Only for those who can handle it!

items.name: Bread Basket Combo
items.description: Experience the fusion of flavors with our club-style grilled tandoori paneer sandwich - paired with your choice of french fries.

items.name: Bun-wich Combo
items.description: Choose from our range of buttery & fluffy maska buns paired with your preferred sandwich made with fresh ingredients and bold spices. Order now!

items.name: Evening Drive Combo
items.description: Check out our Spicy Masala Bun + Crispy Veggie Fingers (5 Pcs) + Choice of Tea - together in a combo, a perfect blend of taste and refreshment!

items.name: Finger FriesTea Combo
items.description: The tasty trio of perfectly seasoned Veggie Fingers + Choice of Fries + Choice of Tea - a flavorful treat for your hunger pangs awaits indeed.

items.name: Maska Poha Combo
items.description: Choose from our array of maska buns with different flavours to pair with a tangy bowl of poha - both designed to bring you joy with every bite.

items.name: Chai Samosa Combo
items.description: Awesome aromatic chai options for you to choose from paired with crispy samosa pockets (2 pcs) - make the perfect combo for quick bites.

items.name: Shake-O-Holic Combo
items.description: Choose from our range of creamy milkshakes and pair it with our signature cheese garlic bread - savoring the best of both worlds in one addictive combo.

items.name: Sandwichill Combo
items.description: Experience a delightful duo of your choice of savory sandwich and your choice of refreshing cold coffee. It is the perfect blend of taste and refreshment!

items.name: Snackoffee Combo
items.description: Try this delightful combo by picking your choice of puff and combining it with your favorite from our range of cold coffee. That is one irresistible combo there!

items.name: Healthy Combo
items.description: Craving something healthy yet tasty? Then this combo is for you! Indulge in the goodness of upma, pair it with handvo, and make a trio with a chai of your choice!

items.name: My Pocket Combo
items.description: This is the perfect combo for indulging in our yummy Upma + Thepla + Refreshing Tea at the same time, destined to fulfill your mid-day cravings.

items.name: Gujarati Special Combo
items.description: Embark on a flavorsome journey of Gujarat with our Gujarati special combo that includes yummy Upma + Handvo + Thepla + your choice of Tea.

items.name: Black Tea (2 Cups)
items.description: The perfect refreshment for those who like their cuppa to be hot and black! Just pure taste and flavour of authentic Assamese tea leaves and sugar as per your preferences.

items.name: Healthy Tea (2 Cups)
items.description: Healthy tea is a new version of green tea with pure honey added to it. It is delicious and at the same time is good for health too. You will definitely remember its unique taste.

items.name: Kavo (2 Cups)
items.description: Kahvo is the most popular version of tea without milk ? created with Kahvo powder made from selected spices & herbs. It is served hot, and that makes a healthy impact on body as well.

items.name: Green Tea (2 Cups)
items.description: A detoxing and relaxing cup of hot green tea for those who like to take extra care of their health. It is made with hot water, herbs, and sugar ? boiled together perfectly.

items.name: Indian Masala Chai (2 Cups)
items.description: Our Indian Masala Tea hits the right spot with its sweet & aromatic chai spices which transports you back to simpler times. There is no better feeling than sipping it with your favourite snacks

items.name: Elaichi Chai (2 Cups)
items.description: The comfort in a cup with the hint of elaichi and sugar in it. Treat yourself to a nice cup of piquant Elaichi Tea that's not only comforting but refreshing. Perfect for pick-me-up during the long working day.

items.name: Sugar Free Tea (2 Cups)
items.description: A scintillating cup of hot tea made with Sugar-free, for the health-conscious tea lovers. Customize it with your favourite flavour from ginger-pudina/ masala/ elaichi/ cinnamon/ saffron.

items.name: Traditional Tea (2 Cups)
items.description: An aromatic blend of ginger, elaichi, fresh tea leaves, milk and sugar. Our Traditional Tea is our signature blend of perfection that transports you back to simpler times.

items.name: Pudina Elaichi Tea (2 Cups)
items.description: Featuring Elaichi. A sweetened pudina chai flavored with notes of elaichi in luscious milk and chai spices. A delicious way to start the day.

items.name: Ginger & Pudina Tea (2 Cups)
items.description: Sweet and Warm, the Ginger Pudina is the definition of cozy, this season! It is a blend of aromatic tea leaves, garnished ginger and cool mint leaves added to sugar and milk made with extra love just for you.

items.name: Blueberry Mint Ice Tea
items.description: The Blueberry Mint Ice Tea boasts of an assortment of blueberry & rose mint flavours. It also has the authentic Assamese tea leaves and ice cubes to make it refreshing.

items.name: Peach Ice Tea
items.description: Peach syrup, black tea and a squeeze of lime into a lush, light, peach iced tea.

items.name: Black Coffee (2 Cups)
items.description: The legendary cup of black coffee that has millions of fans all over the world. It is created with authentic Columbian coffee powder and hot water to make your cuppa awesome.

items.name: Hot Coffee Hazelnut (2 Cups)
items.description: The classic cup of hot coffee  Hazelnut created with creamy milk and authentic Columbian coffee. It is one of the most popular refreshments that is served hot to revitalize your senses.

items.name: Hot Coffee Vanilla (2 Cups)
items.description: Vanilla and coffee come together to create a cup of coffee that instantly puts you in good mood. It is added with hot milk and sugar to make it even more interesting.

items.name: Cappuccino Cold Coffee*
items.description: Cappuccino Cold Coffee which has the bold taste of coffee combined with milk and sugar. And it is blended with ice cubes to make it chilled, frothy and refreshing.

items.name: Mocha Cold Coffee*
items.description: A bitter-sweet symphony,perfect cuppa of Mocha Cold Coffee with finely balanced proportions of coffee beans, coco powder, milk, and ice cubes. It refreshes the mood and keeps you charged up.

items.name: Irish Cold Coffee
items.description: "Creamy and scintillating"Irish Cold Coffee made as per our special Tea Post recipe. Extra creamy milk and Irish coffee beans powder blended with just perfect proportions of ice cubes."

items.name: Hot Chocolate (1 Cups)
items.description: The classical combination of cocoa powder and chocolate culminating in a creamy cup of indulgence. The world's favourite Hot Chocolate flavour with just perfect proportions of milk & sugar.

items.name: Bournvita Hot
items.description:
"A hot cup of milk with the authentic Bournvita flavour and sweetness that makes your heart go yumm. It's energizing, it's refreshing, and it's the perfect companion for quick bites.
"

items.name: Bournvita Cold
items.description:
"A cup of cold milk with the classic Bournvita flavour - chilled to perfection with ice. It?s sweet enough to perfectly enhance the creaminess and chocolatiness of Bournvita in it. 

"

items.name: Cold Coco
items.description: "The classic old cold cocoa with the signature flavour of cocoa powder and sugar together. Both blended with creamy milk and ice cubes to give it a unique texture and taste."

items.name: Milk Shake Chocolate
items.description:
"A Chocolate Milkshake that refreshes your heart from the inside out. Crafted with perfect proportions of chocolate blend, sweet milk, and ice cubes. Get ready to experience the chilled brilliance.
"

items.name: Milk Shake Strawberry
items.description:
"The classic Strawberry Milkshake crafted with a fine balance of sweet milk and strawberry blend. Added with just the perfect proportion of ice cubes to make it even more refreshing.

"

items.name: Milk Shake Oreo
items.description:
"Crunchy Oreo madness,with added cocoa powder and sugar , making it a combination of two extraordinary experiences. Sometimes it?s chewy, and sometimes it?s like yummy sips of Choco goodness.
"

items.name: Kala Khatta Cooler
items.description: A summer must-have drink! Experience the taste of cumin and black grapes, blended with ice cubes to make it energising. Served chilled, our Kala Khatta is a favourite.

items.name: Mango Chilli Cooler
items.description: The mix of spicy chillies with the all-time favourite mango, add in some ice and blend away the woes. Beat the heat with our Chilli Mango and feel refreshed.

items.name: Fruit Punch
items.description:
"A stimulating cup of Fruit Punch loaded with finely balanced flavours of different fruits. It is served chilled with a good proportion of ice cubes to make it energizing.

"

items.name: Lemon Ginger
items.description: Wink wala drink

items.name: Masala Lemonade Cooler
items.description: Squeeze the day with a Masala Lemonade. Made of tangy lemon juice, jeera masala added the icecubes, a glass of Masala Lemonade is preferrably an ideal refreshing drink considering a good dose of vitamin C.

items.name: Chocolate Maska Bun
items.description: A small bite of this mouth watering bun for Breakfast will satisfy your craving for something sweet the entire day.

items.name: Seviyan Upma
items.description: The solution to your "I'm craving something nice" is here! Prepared with Sevaiya, indulge in this dish which defines comfort food.

items.name: Masala Oats
items.description: Your quick fix of healthy snacks is here. Now beat the hunger with a delicious and tasty dose of masala oats to kick off your day.

items.name: Poha
items.description: Classic Indian light snack created with steamed Poha (puffed rice) along with chopped Green Chillies. They are then garnished with Namkeen to make it a little crispy.

items.name: Samosa ( 2 Pc )
items.description: The king of Indian snacks ;crispy fried Samosa pockets with the special Tea Post potato filling. It creates a magical combination with hot tea, perfect for quick bites anytime.

items.name: Thepla ( 3 Pcs)
items.description: The most popular traditional Gujarati dish ,masaledar Thepla Rotis made with added spices and herbs, nicely cooked on a Tawa and served hot with a portion of tangy Achar (pickle).

items.name: Upma
items.description: A classical south Indian light snack made with Rava and vegetables such as chopped tomato, capsicum, and green peas. It is healthy, and it is served hot to create a fulfilling experience.

items.name: Maska Bun
items.description:
"The classic Indian sidekick of a nice cup of hot tea. A perfect hunger killer and energizer snack with a big dollop of butter hidden between two layers of a bun.
"

items.name: Maska Bun With Jam
items.description:
"One step ahead from the classic Muska Bun, it has delicious jam along with butter within two slices of a bun. With every bite, it leaves you yearning for a little more & more
"

items.name: Spicy Masala Bun
items.description: The epitome of bun revolution's with grated cheese concealed within two layers of bun layered with spicy green chutney. Garnished with chilli flakes and oregano. This is a grilled brilliance.

items.name: Veggie Fingers (5 Pcs)
items.description: Super crispy veggie fingers ? deep fried to create a glowing brown crust on the outside and veggie stuffing inside. Veggie fingers are served hot, and with a cup of tea, they are just pure delight.

items.name: Cheese Garlic Bread
items.description: Round Garlic Bread slices - which are baked nicely to make the edges super crispy. A layer of creamy cheese over it which you can garnish with your favourite spices & herbs.

items.name: Handvo
items.description: Traditional Gujarati Handvo pancakes made from rice & dal batter added with green chillies, green peas, and veggies. It is fried with sesame & mustard seeds and served hot.

items.name: French Fries Sprinkle Flavours
items.description: Your favourite French Fries' visit to the new flavour Peri Peri Mix. A must-try for any French fries lover.

items.name: French Fries With Cheese
items.description: Cheesy French fries are in a different league altogether. Potato sticks - fried to perfection and then sprinkled with grated cheese to make it scrumptious. It?s a piece of heaven in every bite.

items.name: Bread Butter Sandwich
items.description: Nothing beats the simplicity and legacy of the good old Bread Butter. slices of fresh bread concealing nothing but pure butter within. With a cup of tea, it is heaven.

items.name: Jam Butter Sandwich
items.description: If you have a craving for something sweet and buttery .this is it! slices of fresh bread are layered with butter first, and then yummy jam takes the centre stage.

items.name: Vegetable Grilled Sandwich
items.description: An interesting way to eat healthy veggies. It is made with two bread slices containing layers of healthy veggies such as onion, tomato, cucumber.

items.name: Cheese Butter Sandwich
items.description: The simplest Grilled Sandwich with just cheese and butter in it. It is garnished with tangy chat masala. And along with a cup of tea, it just creates pure magic.

items.name: Cheese Chilly Sandwich
items.description: Grilled sandwich prepared with chopped onions, chopped capsicum, a lot of cheese, and a hint of chat masala over it. It has chillies, but it's just ideal spicy, not more, not less.

items.name: Tandoori Paneer Sandwich
items.description: slices of bread stuffed with yummy Tandoori Paneer filler, layered with butter and grilled till it's crispy. The filler contains fresh & yummy paneer, tandoori smoky mayo, and chopped vegetables.

items.name: Mexican Cheese Sandwich
items.description: slices of bread holding our special Mexican filler within, grilled to perfection. The Mexican Cheese Sandwich is made with Mexican mayo, chopped veggies, cheese, herbs, and spices.

items.name: Paneer Piri Piri Sandwich
items.description: A special  Peri Peri Grilled Sandwich for those who like it Peri Peri hot. Bread slices are filled with nothing but Peri Peri mayo, panner, chopped vegetables, chilli flakes, and oregano.

items.name: Masala Noodles
items.description: With each bite delicious and satisfying, Smith & Jones Masala Noodles is a contemporary recipe with chopped onion, capsicum & tomato sprinkled on, the noodle masala. Usually feeds the 10-year-old in you.

items.name: Schezwan Noodles
items.description: A quick and simple noodle bowl for one. This recipe for veggie Ching's Schezwan noodles is crafted using chopped vegetables, onion, capsicum, tomato & Schezwan noodle masala. Yummy for the tummy, the perfect looking, inviting bowl of noodles is utterly delicious.

items.name: Tadka Noodles
items.description: Be pout ready

items.name: Fiery Puff
items.description: Delicious Indian bakery-style crispy snack prepared with wheat flour and Fiery ingredients inside including chopped vegetables onion, capsicum, tomato and Fiery Mayo spread. Always acknowledged as the savory Fiery settlement.

items.name: Schezwan Puff
items.description: Delicious Indian bakery-style crispy snack prepared with wheat flour and Schezwan ingredients inside including chopped vegetables onion, capsicum, tomato and Schezwan Mayo spread. Always acknowledged as the savory Schezwan settlement.

items.name: Tandoori Puff
items.description: Delicious Indian bakery-style crispy snack prepared with wheat flour and Tandoori ingredients inside including chopped vegetables onion, capsicum, tomato and Tandoori Mayo spread. Always acknowledged as the savory Tandoori settlement.

items.name: Peri Peri Puff
items.description: Delicious Indian bakery-style crispy snack prepared with wheat flour and Peri Peri ingredients inside including chopped vegetables onion, capsicum, tomato and Peri Peri Mayo spread. Always acknowledged as the savory Peri Peri settlement.

items.name: Veg Puff
items.description: Crispy bakery-style puff stuffed with smashed aloo & spices is a popular snack eaten in Gujarat. The crunch from the crispy buttery puff makes this the perfect snack to keep you going through the day.

items.name: Chinese Puff
items.description: Crispy bakery-style wheat flour making stuffed with noodles made in soy sauce is an ideal bite for the one in want of crunch & spice. The crispy buttery delight is deeply loved across the menu.

items.name: Cheese Puff
items.description: Crispy bakery-style savory, flaky on the outside and flavorful mashed potato mix filling inside. Added extra layer of grated cheese makes the snack more delicious and a perfect accompaniment for tea-time.

items.name: Mexican Puff
items.description: Delicious Indian bakery-style crispy snack prepared with wheat flour and Mexican ingredients inside including chopped vegetables onion, capsicum, tomato and Mexican Mayo spread. Always acknowledged as the savory Mexican settlement.

items.name: Thepla (3 Pcs)-Jain Food
items.description: Served with pickles.Jispe har gujarati trip karta hai

items.name: Handvo-Jain Food
items.description: No onion & garlic

items.name: Maska Bun-Jain Food
items.description: "The classic Indian sidekick of a nice cup of hot tea. A perfect hunger killer and energizer snack with a big dollop of butter hidden between two layers of a bun."

items.name: Khichu
items.description: A perfect solution to those street food cravings! Prepared from the rice flour, Gujarati Khichu is an indulgent dish spiced up with some green chilies, cumin seeds and carom seeds. Usually served with raw oil and methi masala, this popular gujarati dish defines comfort.

items.name: Schezwan Paneer Wrap
items.description: Both soothing and tempting, Schezwan Paneer Wrap is made of luscious paneer pieces, schezwan sauce and chilli sauce fried with a hint of lemon in it. This wrap is perfect to pick up your mood with its spicy and chatpata medley of flavours!

items.name: Fiery Paneer Wrap
items.description: Both soothing and tempting, Fiery Paneer Wrap is made of luscious paneer pieces, Fierysauce and chilli sauce fried with a hint of lemon in it. This wrap is perfect to pick up your mood with its spicy and chatpata medley of flavours!

items.name: Mexican Wrap
items.description: Both soothing and tempting, Mexican Wrap is made of Mexican sauce and chilli sauce fried with a hint of lemon in it. This wrap is perfect to pick up your mood with its spicy and chatpata medley of flavours!

items.name: Tandoori Paneer Wrap
items.description: Tasty bite-sized fried paneer pieces mixed with spices, chopped onion, tomatoes, coriander and chillies stuffed in a wrap. If you're tired of potato-based snacks, give Tandoori Paneer Wrap a try; we promise you’ll be hooked!

items.name: Fiery Classic Burger
items.description: Craving some heat? This fiery burger is set to increase the temperatures! Spiced aloo patty served between two perfectly grilled buns topped with fresh veggies and a rich spread of fiery mayo to top it off.
